sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"地图，图"之意。
means: chart ： 指航海地图，也指图表。
map ： 指标有国家大小、城市、铁路、河流、山脉、海洋等的地图。
graph ： 多指用纵横坐标之间关系的曲线表示两个量之间的图表。

word_mean: 按照一定数学法则，运用符号系统、以图形或数字的形式表示具有空间分布特性的自然与社会现象的载体。

jx.jx_en_mean: To make well-known, prominent, or famous.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from medieval Latin mappa mundi, literally 'sheet of the world', from Latin mappa 'sheet, napkin' + mundi 'of the world' (genitive of mundus)

entry.def: A map is a drawing of a particular area such as a city, a country, or a continent, showing its main features as they would appear if you looked at them from above.

example.ex: He unfolded the map and set it on the floor...
example.tran: 他打开地图，放在了地板上。

example.ex: Have you got a map of the city centre?

entry.def: A map is a drawing that gives special information about an area.
To map an area means to make a map of it.

example.ex: ...a spacecraft which is using radar to map the surface of Venus.
example.tran: 使用雷达绘制金星表面地图的宇宙飞船
对海底地形的更精确绘制

entry.def: If you say that someone or something put a person, thing, or place on the map, you approve of the fact that they made it become well-known and important.

example.ex: ...the attempts of the Edinburgh Festival's organisers to put C.P. Taylor firmly on the map...
example.tran: 爱丁堡艺术节的组织者们为使C.P.泰勒名扬四海所作的努力

example.ex: This could put cider back on the map as one of our great national drinks.
example.tran: 这样可以让苹果酒再度名扬四方，成为我们重要的国酒之一。

means.word_mean: 1. a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it)
2. a function such that for every element of one set there is a unique element of another set
1. make a map of; show or establish the features of details of;
2. explore or survey for the purpose of making a map;

sentences.sentence: "We haven't even begun to map the many galaxies that we know exist"

means.word_mean: 3. locate within a specific region of a chromosome in relation to known DNA or gene sequences;
4. plan, delineate, or arrange in detail;
5. depict as if on a map;

sentences.sentence: "sorrow was mapped on the mother's face"

means.word_mean: 6. to establish a mapping (of mathematical elements or sets)

example.en: There was fear and hatred all over his map.
example.zh: 他脸上布满了恐惧和仇恨。

example.en: I never wrote a bad map in my life.
example.zh: 我一生从没开过一张空头支票。
